FUNC.NAME: upcEanConvertGs1dataBarToUpcEan
FUNC.PATH: Barcode Scanner\Decoder and Parameter Tags\Upc Ean
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the upcEanConvertGs1dataBarToUpcEan property.

PARAM.NAME: upcEanConvertGs1dataBarToUpcEan
PARAM.DESC: If true, GS1 DataBar barcodes will be converted to UPC/EAN format. For this setting to work UPC/EAN and GS1 DataBar symbologies must be enabled.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner and sets upcEanConvertGs1dataBarToUpcEan property

COMMENT.COMMENT_DATA: The upcEanConvertGs1dataBarToUpcEan decoder property was previously known as upcEanConvertRssToUpcEan. Code written for the old syntax decoder will be compatible with the new naming convention.

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports UPC-EAN and GS1 DataBar decoders
